text: Joshua Paul Riley (born January 21, 1981) is an American politician and lawyer. He has been the U.S. Representative for New York's 19th congressional district since 2025. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Before, he was a policy analyst at the U.S. Department of Labor and as counsel on the U.S. Senate Judiciary Committee. ==References== ==Other websites== *Campaign website *Congressional website * * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:Lawyers from New York (state) Category:People from Endicott, New York Category:People from Ithaca, New York Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Josh Riley
